prompts.deleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this {{itemType}}?
prompts.inDev: This feature is still in development.
prompts.removeItem: Are you sure you want to remove this {{itemType}}?
prompts.wip: This page is still in construction.

errors.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum file size is 5MB.

welcomeCard.projectDescription: Praxis is an open source social network with features for collaborative decision making. Proposals are the main focus and come with a wide variety of voting features, with consensus as the default. Create a group and set it to no-admin, allowing group members to create proposals and democratically decide on settings, name, theme, or planning of real world events.
welcomeCard.inDev: This project is still in development and is not yet intended for serious use outside of testing or research purposes.

prompts.joinGroupToVote: You need to be a group member to vote on this proposal.
prompts.loginToVote: You need to be logged in to vote.
prompts.cannotEditProposedRoles: Editing of proposed roles is still in development.
prompts.emptyPermsAndMembers: No proposed permissions or role members.

toasts.noVotingAfterClose: This proposal has been closed and can no longer be voted on.
toasts.noVotingAfterRatification: This proposal has been ratified and can no longer be voted on.
toasts.ratifiedSuccess: This proposal has been ratified! ðŸŽ‰

errors.missingGroupCoverPhoto: Proposals to change group cover photo must include an image
errors.missingGroupDescription: Proposals to change group description must include a description field
errors.missingGroupId: Only group proposals are supported at this time
errors.missingGroupName: Proposals to change group name must include a name field
errors.missingRole: Proposals to change or add group roles must include a role

prompts.joinToComment: No comments yet. Join the group to comment.

errors.signUp: There was an error creating your account.
errors.update: There was an error updating your account.
errors.remove: There was an error removing this member.

prompts.alreadyRegistered: You have already created an account.
prompts.logOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
prompts.removeUser: Are you sure you want to permanently remove this member from the server? They will lose all of their data and this cannot be undone.
prompts.removeSelf: Are you sure you want to permanently remove yourself from the server? You will lose all of your data and this cannot be undone.
prompts.unfollow: Are you sure you want to unfollow this person?

validation.noUserWithEmail: No user exists with that email.
validation.passwordConfirmMatch: Password and Confirm Password must match.

prompts.loginToLike: You need to be logged in to like this post.

errors.consentVotingTimeLimitRequired: Voting time limit is required for consent decision making.

prompts.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the group?
prompts.publicGroup: Public Group: Anyone can view the group page and any content posted by group members.
prompts.settingDisabledForConsent: This setting is disabled for consent decision making.
prompts.confirmNoAdmin: Are you sure you want to set this group to No Admin? All major changes to the group will have to be made via proposals. This includes changes to the group name, cover photo, settings, roles, events, and more.

descriptions.adminModel: Choose from no-admin, rotating admin, or standard to determine how the group is managed.
descriptions.decisionMakingModel: Choose from consensus or consent decision-making to determine how decisions are made in the group.
descriptions.privacy: Choose whether or not the group and it's content are viewable to the public.
descriptions.ratificationThreshold: Set the minimum percentage of positive votes required for a proposal to reach consensus.
descriptions.reservationsLimit: Set a limit for the acceptable number of reservations allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
descriptions.standAsidesLimit: Set a limit for the acceptable number of stand asides allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
descriptions.votingTimeLimit: Set a time limit for how long proposals can be voted on before they're closed or ratified.

explanations.adminModel: No Admin groups rely on proposals, while Rotating Admin groups swap out new admins regularly, and standard groups can have multiple admins.
explanations.decisionMakingModel: The process the group uses to make decisions together, which can be consensus or consent based.
explanations.privacy: Public groups are viewable to anyone, while private groups are only viewable to server members.
explanations.ratificationThreshold: The minimum percentage of positive votes required for a proposal to reach consensus.
explanations.reservationsLimit: The maximum number of reservations allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
explanations.standAsidesLimit: The maximum number of stand asides allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
explanations.votingTimeLimit: The minimum amount of time proposals can be voted on before they're closed or ratified.

tips.organizeWithGroups: Groups are a great way to organize your community. Whether you want to share your interests, plan events, or collaborate on projects, groups are the perfect place to do it.
tips.groupProposals: Proposals can be used to change how groups function, how they're structured, and who's in charge.

errors.missingLocation: Location cannot be empty for in person events
errors.onlineOrOffline: Event must be either virtual or in person
errors.invalidLink: External link must be a valid URL

descriptions.approveMemberRequests: Allows members to view member requests and to allow new members to join the group.
descriptions.banGroupMembers: Allows members to remove other members from the group.
descriptions.createEvents: Allows members to create and plan events.
descriptions.createInvites: Allows members to invite new people to the server.
descriptions.deleteGroup: Allows members to permanently delete the group.
descriptions.manageComments: Allows members to remove or hide comments by other members.
descriptions.manageEvents: Allows members to remove or edit events created by other members.
descriptions.manageGroupSettings: Allows members to make changes to the group's settings.
descriptions.manageInvites: Allows members to create or delete invite links for the server.
descriptions.managePosts: Allows members to remove or hide posts by other members.
descriptions.manageRoles: Allows members to create new roles as well as edit or delete other roles.
descriptions.removeGroups: Allows members to remove groups from the server.
descriptions.removeMembers: Allows members to remove other members from the server.
descriptions.removeProposals: Allows members to remove proposals posted by other members.
descriptions.updateGroup: Allows members to edit the group's name, description, and cover photo.

prompts.expiredOrInvalid: Your invite link is either expired or invalid.
prompts.inviteRequired: You need to be invited in order to sign up.

descriptions.canaryStatement: Display a message stating that this server has not been compromised by a third party.

errors.couldNotUpdate: Server settings could not be updated
